articles.title: Price of a pint of milk to surge by 50pc, industry warns - The Telegraph
articles.description: Dairy bosses from the UK and Europe flew into Brussels last week for crisis talks over rocketing feed, fertiliser and fuel costs
articles.content: Dairy industry bosses from the UK and elsewhere in Europe flew into Brussels at the end of last week with talks led by Eucolait, the continents leading dairy industry group. Dairy processors, which a… [+1611 chars]

articles.title: Slovak minister says paying in roubles an option, country needs gas - Reuters.com
articles.description: The economy minister of Slovakia, which relies on Russian gas for around 85% of its demand, said the country could not be cut off from Russian gas flows and if it had to pay in roubles it would, although it backed taking a common European Union stance.
articles.content: PRAGUE, April 3 (Reuters) - The economy minister of Slovakia, which relies on Russian gas for around 85% of its demand, said the country could not be cut off from Russian gas flows and if it had to p… [+1481 chars]
